author: Richard Newbern
text:
Hello- Does anyone have a Market Study or a Market Study RFP for development of a downtown block?
Brunswick, Ga. (pop. 15,400) is preparing a Market Study for development of a downtown block. The block was the site of a former health facility that was demolished. Possible investors are a conference center, downtown hotel, and a parking garage. However, the City needs a Market Study to guide our decisions.
Any suggestions or resources are appreciated
title: Market Study for Downtown Block
